#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
 
int input()
{   int n=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<='9' && c>='0')
    {
        n=(n<<3) + (n<<1) + c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return n;
}
int* count[200001];
char s[200001];
int main(void) {
	int size=0,i,j;
	char c=getchar_unlocked();
	while(c>='a' && c<='z')
	(s[size++]=c),(c=getchar_unlocked());
	s[size]='\0';
	int q=input();
	for( i=0;i<size;i++)
	    count[i]=(int*)calloc(26,sizeof(int));
	count[0][s[0]-'a']++;
	for( i=1;i<size;i++)
	    {
	        for( j=0;j<26;j++)
	            count[i][j]=count[i-1][j];
	        count[i][s[i]-'a']++; 
	    }
	//  for( i=0;i<size;i++){
	 //   for( j=0;j<26;j++) printf("%d ",count[i][j]);
	//      printf("\n");
	//  }
	while(q--)
	{   
	    int l=input()-1;
	    int r=input()-1;
	    int length=0;
	    int onepresent=0;
	    int i;
	    if(l==0)
	    {
	         for(i=0;i<26;i++)
	        {   if(count[r][i]==0) ;
	            else if(count[r][i]%2==0)
				 length+=count[r][i];
	            else {
	                length+=count[r][i]-1;
	                onepresent=1;
	            }
	        }
	      if(onepresent) length++;
	       printf("%d\n",length); 
	        continue;
	    }
	    for(i=0;i<26;i++)
	        {   if(count[r][i]-count[l-1][i]==0) ;
	            else if((count[r][i]-count[l-1][i])%2==0) length+=(count[r][i]-count[l-1][i]);
	            else {
	                length+=(count[r][i]-count[l-1][i])-1;
	                onepresent=1;
	            }
	        }
	   if(onepresent) length++;
	    printf("%d\n",length); 
	}
	return 0;
}
